clauses.gdprCompliance: This DPA complies with Article 28 GDPR and German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG).
clauses.dataSubjects: Data subjects are EU residents whose personal data is processed.
clauses.supervisoryAuthority: Competent supervisory authority is the relevant German Data Protection Authority (Landesdatenschutzbeauftragte) or Federal Commissioner (BfDI).
clauses.subProcessors: Sub-processors may only be engaged with prior written consent and must be located in EU/EEA or provide adequate safeguards under GDPR Chapter V.
clauses.dataBreachNotification: Processor shall notify Controller without undue delay (within 24 hours) upon becoming aware of a personal data breach.
clauses.dataRetention: Personal data shall be deleted or returned upon termination unless retention required by German law.

compliance: Bundesdatenschutzgesetz (BDSG - German Federal Data Protection Act)

annexes.technicalMeasures: Processor implements technical and organizational measures per Art. 32 GDPR including encryption, pseudonymization, and access controls.
